blog.name: bixbiboom
blog.title: I myself am also Enchanter Pumat Sol
blog.description:
Bixbi, older than you.

Fat queer of indeterminate origin.

Possibly a lesser demon.

Hellenist serving Hestia, Hermes and Chiron.

Critical Role has taken over my life and my blog.

Taliesin Jaffe is my boyfriend.

I love you.

#eyesnevershut

tags: remember when I used to tag by episode folks
summary: honestly this reverse gravity ravine might be one of the most chaotic scenes in CR1? the undead vortex in the ceiling grabbing...
body: honestly this reverse gravity ravine might be one of the most chaotic scenes in CR1? the undead vortex in the ceiling grabbing at vex and pike, leaving pike clinging to a broom she can’t steer and vex wrestling a zombie midair only attached to the broom by the chain. percy’s gun misfiring so he just runs up the wall with his spider boots. kiki and kerrick on the flying carpet throwing vines and turning undead and yelling as they nearly fall because kerrick has literally never driven a fucking carpet let alone in inverted gravity. vax doing the anxious puppy pace along the edge of the wrong side of the ravine and seriously considering throwing whisper at his sister. allura and kima being the ones sensible enough to dimension door across and pull them all down with the rope. while grog and scanlan just stand, watching, arms crossed, scanlan tripping balls the entire time-

reblog.comment: honestly this reverse gravity ravine might be one of the most chaotic scenes in CR1? the undead vortex in the ceiling grabbing at vex and pike, leaving pike clinging to a broom she can’t steer and vex wrestling a zombie midair only attached to the broom by the chain. percy’s gun misfiring so he just runs up the wall with his spider boots. kiki and kerrick on the flying carpet throwing vines and turning undead and yelling as they nearly fall because kerrick has literally never driven a fucking carpet let alone in inverted gravity. vax doing the anxious puppy pace along the edge of the wrong side of the ravine and seriously considering throwing whisper at his sister. allura and kima being the ones sensible enough to dimension door across and pull them all down with the rope. while grog and scanlan just stand, watching, arms crossed, scanlan tripping balls the entire time-

trail.content_raw: honestly this reverse gravity ravine might be one of the most chaotic scenes in CR1? the undead vortex in the ceiling grabbing at vex and pike, leaving pike clinging to a broom she can’t steer and vex wrestling a zombie midair only attached to the broom by the chain. percy’s gun misfiring so he just runs up the wall with his spider boots. kiki and kerrick on the flying carpet throwing vines and turning undead and yelling as they nearly fall because kerrick has literally never driven a fucking carpet let alone in inverted gravity. vax doing the anxious puppy pace along the edge of the wrong side of the ravine and seriously considering throwing whisper at his sister. allura and kima being the ones sensible enough to dimension door across and pull them all down with the rope. while grog and scanlan just stand, watching, arms crossed, scanlan tripping balls the entire time-
trail.content: honestly this reverse gravity ravine might be one of the most chaotic scenes in CR1? the undead vortex in the ceiling grabbing at vex and pike, leaving pike clinging to a broom she can’t steer and vex wrestling a zombie midair only attached to the broom by the chain. percy’s gun misfiring so he just runs up the wall with his spider boots. kiki and kerrick on the flying carpet throwing vines and turning undead and yelling as they nearly fall because kerrick has literally never driven a fucking carpet let alone in inverted gravity. vax doing the anxious puppy pace along the edge of the wrong side of the ravine and seriously considering throwing whisper at his sister. allura and kima being the ones sensible enough to dimension door across and pull them all down with the rope. while grog and scanlan just stand, watching, arms crossed, scanlan tripping balls the entire time-

tags: idk why the first half of this just kinda disappeared when i posted it? it's fixed now
summary: I liked your Fjord fic where he saw Spider!Frumpkin! If you’re still feeling ficcy, maybe more light angst? The Mighty Nein are...
question: I liked your Fjord fic where he saw Spider!Frumpkin! If you’re still feeling ficcy, maybe more light angst? The Mighty Nein are not very good at being apart from each other anymore. But sometimes they have to split up. And sometimes they have to wait for the others to return. They’re not always very good at waiting, either. (Aka they angst about waiting.) (Maybe while half the party is inside talking and the other half is outside, maybe some other split up, maybe waiting in the happy fun ball.)
answer:
ANON okay first of all I’m so glad you liked my fjord fic!!! <3 SECOND of all, it’s like you read my mind because i’m already a couple of paragraphs into a fic about beau being the first one out of the happy fun ball and absolutely losing her mind when the others don’t follow her right away. i will fast track that one and post it just for you

(also, big big big thanks to everyone else who’s sent me prompts and recs! keep them coming, I love them all, I’m going to leave them in my inbox and get to them in the next couple days!)

reblog.comment:
ANON okay first of all I’m so glad you liked my fjord fic!!! <3 SECOND of all, it’s like you read my mind because i’m already a couple of paragraphs into a fic about beau being the first one out of the happy fun ball and absolutely losing her mind when the others don’t follow her right away. i will fast track that one and post it just for you

(also, big big big thanks to everyone else who’s sent me prompts and recs! keep them coming, I love them all, I’m going to leave them in my inbox and get to them in the next couple days!)
